webMethods Adapter for SAP IDoc Java API

Description

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc
webMethods Adapter for SAP IDoc Java API.
com.wm.pkg.sap.idoc
Deprecated: As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the SAP Adapter IDoc Class Library implementation.

Description

The webMethods Adapter for SAP IDoc Java API is based on the SAP Java IDoc Class Library which consists of two parts, the SAP Java Base IDoc Class Library and the SAP Java Connector IDoc Class Library. The SAP Java Base IDoc Class Library provides an API which helps navigating, reading, filling, and modifying IDocs. This base package is middleware independent. Creating, sending, and receiving IDocs is middleware dependent. To make use of the SAP Java Base IDoc Class Library, the Adapter for SAP comes with an additional middleware dependent add-on package implementing the defined interfaces. This is the so called webMethods Adapter for SAP IDoc Java API.

For samples on how to use the SAP Java IDoc Class Library, visit the SAP Service Marketplace and check out the SAP Java Connector > Tools & Services section.

The packages of the SAP Java IDoc Class Library includes the software as well as documentation available via the SAP Service Marketplace under the SAP Java Connector section.
